attributes.action: force the major supermarkets to offer Freedom Food in their meat ranges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In this day and age it is very difficult to ensure the meat you buy has been raised, housed and killed in a humane and ethical way.
Freedom Food is monitored by the RSPCA and therefore meat bearing its label is guaranteed to have been treated to the highest of standards and not to have suffered unduly at any stage in the process.  
Too few supermarkets stock Freedom Food forcing people to either leave meat from their diets or to condone the mistreatment of animals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
